title: Still haven't received star guardian quiz icon
body:
Just wanted to know what the wait time is for these icons? 

Says 3-4 days on the quiz web page but its been almost 3 weeks for me. Is this a technical difficulty or have i done something wrong on my end? Most of my friends have received theirs. 

Cheers for any help or suggestions guys <3

replies.body:
Hey there,

Give it a couple more days (48 hours) if you still haven't received your icon then I'd [follow it up with Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), as they're the only ones who can assist with account specific inquiries.
